text:
Ruqtasya# raqSmimA da#dE || 
yaqj~jO dEqvAnAqm pratyE#ti suqmnamAdi#tyAsOq Bava#tA mRuDaqyanta#H | 
A vOq&rvAcI# sumaqtirva#vRutyAdaq(gm)q hOSciqdyA va#rivOqvittaqrA&sa#t || 
Suci#raqpaH sUqyava#sA ada#bdhaq upa# kShEti vRuqddhava#yAH suqvIra#H | 
nakiqShTaM Gnaqntyanti#tOq na dUqrAdya A#diqtyAnAqM Bava#tiq praNI#tau || 
dhAqraya#nta AdiqtyAsOq jagaqthsthA dEqvA viSva#syaq Buva#nasya gOqpAH | 
dIqrGAdhi#yOq rakSha#mANA-  [  ]  63
